Portoflio v1.0

2015

This was my first attempt at self promotion when I was first interested in web technologies. The site itself was just one static page with a script that would add and remove the "." after the "Loading" text. The script used recursion to add the dots every 500ms until the counter reached 5. Then it would reset the counter, and remove the dots from the page, and repaint "Loading" to the jumbotron. Giving the illusion that something was loading. I include a blurb with my contact info within an html comment. The site itself lived on a server in the basement for a few years - built it from an old desktop, installed apache, and connected to it with putty from my new computer.
